SQLResource.query: SELECT /*+ INDEX(HIS IDX01_C_CARD_SAV_USE_HIS) */ SUBSTR(USE_DT ,1 ,6) AS USE_YM , SUM(SAV_MLG) AS SAV_MLG , SUM(USE_MLG) AS USE_MLG , SUM(LOS_MLG_UNUSE) AS LOS_MLG , SUM(SAV_MLG - USE_MLG - LOS_MLG_UNUSE) AS REM_MLG FROM C_CARD_SAV_USE_HIS WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND USE_DT >= ${SCH_GFR_DATE}||'01' AND USE_DT <= ${SCH_GTO_DATE}||'31' AND USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY SUBSTR(USE_DT, 1 ,6) ORDER BY 1 DESC
